mapper.insert: INSERT INTO member (USERID, PASSWORD, NAME, SSN, AGE, GENDER, TEAMID, ROLL, SUBJECT, EMAIL, PHONE) VALUES (#{userid}, #{password}, #{name}, #{ssn}, #{age}, #{gender}, #{teamid}, #{roll}, #{subject}, #{email}, #{phone})
mapper.select: SELECT USERID, NAME, SSN, AGE, GENDER, TEAMID, ROLL, PHONE, EMAIL FROM member WHERE USERID LIKE #{userid}
mapper.update: UPDATE member SET PASSWORD = #{password}, TEAMID = #{teamid}, ROLL = #{roll}, PHONE = #{phone}, EMAIL = #{email} WHERE USERID = #{userid}
